definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: They are very good in the transition game and have many offensive weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他們擅長於運動戰，並且在進攻方面有很多辦法。

sentences.english: But the pivotal strategy must be mobile warfare.
sentences.chinese: 但是轉換全局的戰略方針，必然要是運動戰。

sentences.english: Du Xueyan in the jungle with them continue to campaign against Misaki Sato forces.
sentences.chinese: 杜雪顏她們繼續在密林中用運動戰打擊佐藤部隊。

sentences.english: It is possible for us to pursue mobile warfare with the utmost efficiency .
sentences.chinese: 我們有可能以最大的效率來進行運動戰。

sentences.english: When you are shooting off the dribble you want to read the defense.
sentences.chinese: 想在運動戰中得分，你須觀察好對方的防守。
